name: Maria Hwang
body:
### Happy Birthday
My breathing slowed when we first met.

하나, 둘, 셋.

You had surprised me, so

나 말 찾고있었어.

But I could never have foresaw

아직 말 없다

Almost certainly there will come a day

한국어로 잘 말할 수 있는데

I'll never exactly unlock

"매일 항상 생각,

I love you"

Thanks for everything, Maria. I can show you how to edit this page really easily (its all plain text) and make a nice personal page. 

### About Me
I am a Doctoral Candidate  at Teachers College of Columbia University. My twitter handle is [@mariahwang502](https://twitter.com/mariahwang502)

### Monster Appetite
You can check out code for my dissertation on my github account or see the [live version](http://monster-appetite.meteor.com/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
